name: The Big Fish
description:
The Big Fish is a one to two-player, local co-op, competitive fishing game. Cast your line and hope you get a bite. When you do, reel it in. Be fast though, because not only are you racing against the clock and your opponent, but these fish don't like to be caught.

Or try out single-player mode. Where you can get some practice in before your nemesis shows up next.

This game is meant to be played with controllers.

Notice for macOS players: We have not yet obtained a Developer ID from Apple so you may not be able to launch the game on first attempt. If you encounter an error, please follow the instructions here to allow the game to run. About The Developer

Lunatic Games is a game studio created by four university students. Four roommates with a crazy idea to share their love for local co-op games with the world. Based in beautiful British Columbia, Canada, we strive to build cooperative and competitive video games that are meant to be played with good friends, on a comfy couch.
